title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: ADDIE Model-Based Online Training for Disaster Management Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three characteristics of various natural disasters, including human and material impacts.
Learners can analyze and present two or more risk prediction and response strategies per disaster type in deliverable formats.
Learners can develop and submit team-based community-tailored disaster management plans (PPT or report format).
Learners can design at least one disaster simulation scenario using digital tools and evaluate execution outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
